import'./login.css' import logo from '../NavBar/my_logo.jpg' import userAddon from './user.png' import passwordAddon from './password.png' import axios from 'axios' import { useState } from 'react' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function LogIn () { const [userName, setUserName] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const confifuration = { method : "post", url : '/api/v1/auth/Login', data :{ userName, password } } axios(confifuration) .then return( <>
{ e.preventDefault() setUserName(e.target.value) }} />
{ e.preventDefault() setPassword(e.target.value) }} />
) } export default LogIn
